TextLibrary.Text: Your advice has been good so far, Human. What do you suggest now?

Your advice has been good so far, Human. What do you suggest now?
Now? We recapture the passes. If Bane can't cross the mountains then he can't get creatures for his army.

Very well. Then we must retake Skullguard Keep. There is another Arkliche there.
